name: Bench Press
instructions:
Lie back on a bench with a barbell gripped slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Lower the barbell to the chest, keeping elbows at a 45-degree angle.
Push the bar back up to the starting position.

name: Dumbbell Flyes
instructions:
Lie on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
With a slight bend in your elbows, open your arms wide, lowering the weights until they're in line with the chest.
Bring the dumbbells back up by squeezing the chest.

name: Push-Ups
instructions:
Begin in a plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Keep your feet together and your body in a straight line.
Engage your core and glutes. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Push back up to the starting position.

name: Pull-Ups
instructions:
Grip a pull-up bar with palms facing away from you, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Pull yourself up until your chin is over the bar, then lower back down.

name: Bent-Over Row
instructions:
Bend your knees slightly and bend over the bar with your back straight.
Grab the barbell with palms facing down.
Pull the bar towards your chest, then lower it back down.

name: Deadlift
instructions:
Stand with your mid-foot under the barbell.
Bend over and grip the bar, with your shoulder blades directly over the bar.
Bend your knees until your shins touch the bar.
Lift the bar by straightening your back.

name: Squats
instructions:
Stand with feet a little wider than shoulder-width apart, hips stacked over knees, and knees over ankles.
Extend arms out straight so they are parallel with the ground.
Sit back and down as if sitting into an imaginary chair.
Lower down so thighs are as parallel to the floor as possible.
Press back up to start.

name: Leg Press
instructions:
Sit in a leg press machine with your feet shoulder-width apart on the platform.
Lower the platform towards your chest until your legs are at 90 degrees, then push it back up.

name: Lunges
instructions:
Stand with feet hip-width apart.
Take a large step forward with one leg and shift your weight forward so your heel hits the floor first.
Lower your body until your front thigh is parallel to the floor and your back knee is bent at about a 90-degree angle and hovering above the floor.
Return to the starting position.

name: Bicep Curls
instructions:
Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand at arm's length.
Keep your elbows close to your torso and rotate the palms of your hands until they are facing forward.
Now, keeping the upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted.
Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.

name: Tricep Dips
instructions:
Sit on the edge of a chair or bench.
Slide your butt off the edge, supporting yourself with your arms.
Bend and straighten your arms to lower and raise your body.

name: Hammer Curls
instructions:
Stand with a dumbbell in each hand, arms at your sides, palms facing your body.
Keep your upper arms stationary, exhale, and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Lower the weights to the starting position.

name: Shoulder Press
instructions:
Sit on a bench with back support.
Hold a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height.
Extend your arms upward, then lower the dumbbells back to shoulder height.

name: Lateral Raises
instructions:
Stand with a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Raise the arms out to the sides until they're at shoulder height, then slowly lower back down.

name: Front Raises
instructions:
Stand with a dumbbell in each hand in front of your thighs.
Raise one arm straight in front of you to shoulder height, then lower back down.
Repeat with the other arm.

name: Crunches
instructions:
Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Place your hands behind your head without locking your fingers.
Lift your upper body off the floor using your core muscles.
Slowly lower yourself back down.

name: Plank
instructions:
Place your hands directly under your shoulders, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Ground your toes into the floor and squeeze your glutes to stabilize the body.
Neutralize your neck and spine by looking at a spot on the floor about a foot beyond your hands.
Hold this position.

name: Russian Twists
instructions:
Sit on the ground with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Lean back slightly so your torso and thighs form a V shape.
Holding your hands together, twist from side to side.
